name: Click me to get Started
text: The second button allows you to edit me, Click again to save changes

name: Like Your Notes!!
text: Click the heart to like a note, or unlike a note

name: Delete???
text: just click the delete button. WOW! Are you sure you want to delete me, press red confirm tick

name: Lets Sort these notes!
text: The sort button on the bottom left allows you to sort us by name in alphabetical order, press again to swap order

name: Wanna see liked notes
text: Easy Just press the Heart, and toggle by clicking again

name: Pretty Clouds!!
text: Click the edit button, Change the colour by clicking the coloured bar at the bottom and selecting your preferred colour. Confirm edit

name: Important Tasks
text: If you have important task, just enter edit mode and change the number in that top cloud. You can then sort by that number by clicking the exclamation mark

name: New Notes
text: Just press the big New Note Button and BOOM it will pop up

name: BIGGER LETTERS
text: Edit mode, and change the number next to font size!
